sentence: None is more glaring than actions taken against Georgia Governor Brian Kemp for certifying the 2020 election results.
title: Trump Supporters: Deceivers and the Deceived

sentence: Chambers, he said, is taking a page from Ms. Abrams, who energized Georgia voters of color, urban liberals and the scatterings of rural Democrats to nearly win the governorship four years ago, build a political organization and set herself up for a rematch this year with the Republican governor, Brian Kemp.
title: Democratic Dollars Flow Once Again to Likely Lost Causes
